mapper.insert: insert into a_car_info (id, carno, haslicense, licenseid, hastemplicense, temlicense, temstartdate, temenddate, aduitstatus, status, departmentid, staffid, consumerid, registtime, actualregisttime, outtime) values (#{id}, #{carNo}, #{hasLicense}, #{licenseId}, #{hasTempLicense}, #{temLicense}, #{temStartDate}, #{temEndDate}, #{aduitStatus}, #{status}, #{departmentId}, #{staffId}, #{consumerId}, #{registTime}, #{actualRegistTime}, #{outTime})
